蟚字的基本解释

蟚
péng
古同“蟛”。

蟚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［péng］
［《集韻》蒲庚切，平庚，並。］
亦作“蟚1”。
见“蟛蚏”、“蟛蜞”。

蟚字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蟚； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1096第38
【唐韻】薄庚切【集韻】蒲庚切，?音彭。【說文】蟚蜞也。【古今注】蟚蜞，小蟹，生海邊泥中，食土。一名長唧。其一有螯偏大者名擁劒。一名執火。　又蟚螖。【爾雅·釋魚】螖蠌，小者蟧。【註】卽蟚螖也，似蟹而小。　或作蟛。

蟚字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蟚字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［péng］
["Ji Yun" Pu Gengqie, Ping Geng, and. ]
Also known as "蟚1".
See "Wedelia" and "Wedelia".
蟚
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蟚; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1096 Page 38
[Tang Yun] Bo Geng cut [Ji Yun] Pu Geng cut,? Yin Peng. 【Said the text】Far also. [Ancient and modern note] worms, small crabs, raw seaside mud, eat soil. A long chirp. One is the name of those with big cheeks. A fireman.　Fuck again. 【Erya·Shiyu】Cut worms, small ones. [Note] The worms are also small like crabs.　Or as a dragon.
